title: Identifying y, b, and x
text: The first step is to examine the equation $$y=log$$ base b of x and identify y, b, and x.

title: Rewriting the Equation
text: Next, rewrite the equation $$"y=log$$ base b of x" as $$b^y=x$$.

title: Meaning of log
text: When there is no base indicated, log means "log base 10."
